definition: to pull up/to pull out/to draw out by suction/to select/to pick/to stand out (above level)/to surpass/to seize

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
lit. to grab feathers from a flying goose/fig. to seize any opportunity/pragmatic

sentences.english: A thief stole a chicken, to the river epilation cleansing.

sentences.english: There's a name for this behavior: trichotillomania.
sentences.chinese: 這種行爲是有個專業名稱的，拔毛症。

sentences.english: For temporary treatment of mild hirsutism, many women pluck unwanted hairs.
sentences.chinese: 很多女性輕度多毛的暫時性治療是拔毛。

sentences.english: He had assisted his father with defeathering of the diseased birds.

sentences.english: 13goose, song with a knife, pull Mao Jia poured water, ignition cover the pan.

sentences.english: Sexual behaviors should be ignored, as they can be accompanied by aggression or feather picking.
sentences.chinese: 當性行爲被忽略時，它們會伴有攻擊或拔毛行爲。

sentences.english: Actually Baidu depilates collect decrease have 2 kinds of cases.

sentences.english: So, after the website is depilated by Baidu, how should be we faced after all?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，在網站被百度拔毛後，我們究竟該怎麼面對呢？

sentences.english: Ranging from site rankings disappear, while in the whole station to be plucked.
sentences.chinese: 輕則站點排名消失，重則整站被拔毛。

sentences.english: Since I was 12 years old, I've suffered with a condition called Compulsive Hair Pulling.
sentences.chinese: 12歲以來，我就一直遭受着強迫性拔毛症的折磨。
